summary: Strings
title: Strings
body:
by temperamentalTerpsichorean (Nonna_Mouse)

We all deal with things in our own ways. Some move on with their lives. Some are just barely hanging on. All is not well.

Words: 868, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

blog.name: drarry-or-die
blog.title: we need to talk about drarry
blog.description: hallo. here they are, my Harry Potter jokes, drabbles and sometimes arts.

summary: Draco, singing alone:  Hogsmeade Day. See you there. Butterbeers... ordering. Wanna say "Pottah, scared?" But here I go,...
body:
Draco, singing alone: 

Hogsmeade Day. See you there.
Butterbeers… ordering.
Wanna say “Pottah, scared?”
But here I go, mumbling…  

Draco, singing to Harry: 

That’s the plan. Fight again
You and me. Any day.
Love your scar. 

Harry: What?

Draco: No, I, I, I love that star… Anyway.

summary: Do you like harry potter? If so, what house do you identify with and why?
question: Do you like harry potter? If so, what house do you identify with and why?
answer:
yep, I do like Harry Potter. I’d say I’m someone between Gryffindor and Hufflepuff. on the one hand, I’m an emotional and impulsive person, who lives more on an emotional level. I hope I am a good friend and if I love someone/something I put my whole soul on it. - it’s from Gryffindor.

on the other hand, I’m calm and carefree (sometimes more carefree than I have to be). I’m an optimist and always trying to see good in everything. I love nature and feel a kind of connection with it. I know a lot of people but can’t say they’re my friends (or that I am a friend for them) even if they are good people and etc because friendship is something way more than just chatting about meaningless things every day. it’s, no doubts, a kind of love. - it’s from Hufflepuff.

God, it looks like an ode to myself hahaha

well, don’t know…somehow like this

summary: 【伏哈】断骨abo（R18）第四章
title: 【伏哈】断骨abo（R18）第四章
description:
by suliu007

亚当的一根肋骨创造了夏娃，踏入彼此禁忌的深渊
我的骨中骨，我的肉中肉

哈利·波特第一次见到汤姆·里德尔，他的Omega天性催促着：臣服于他、去取悦他
汤姆·里德尔第一次见到哈利·波特，他的Alpha天性叫嚣着：彻底占有他、撕碎他

哈利是汤姆的那根肋骨
汤姆却只想断骨

by Evanaissante

This is a one-shot collection following the very complicated, very animated and sometimes downright stupid love story between Remus John Lupin and Sirius Orion Black. From ridiculous AUs to angst fest texts, there’s something from everybody.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: Estudantes de arquitetura montam cenários de Harry Potter com papelão
title: Estudantes de arquitetura montam cenários de Harry Potter com papelão
description:
Diferentes cenários da série Harry Potter foram criados por alunos de arquitetura da Melbourne School Design, na Austrália, utilizando-se apenas papelão. As esculturas foram expostas na Galeria Dulux, na própria instituição.

Clique para exibir o slide.

Entre as criações, estão A Toca, casa da família Weasley, a loja Olivaras Varinhas e a Grande Escadaria de Hogwarts. O projeto recebeu o nome de Smoke and Mirrors (Fumaça e Espelhos em tradução livre) e foi desenvolvido pelos estudantes durante um curso de verão de 12 dias. Para produzir os cenários, os alunos fizeram cortes a laser, e utilizaram técnicas de fabricação digital e modelagem.

CONTINUA DEPOIS DA PUBLICIDADE

The post Estudantes de arquitetura montam cenários de Harry Potter com papelão appeared first on Potterish.com.

reblog.comment:
Diferentes cenários da série Harry Potter foram criados por alunos de arquitetura da Melbourne School Design, na Austrália, utilizando-se apenas papelão. As esculturas foram expostas na Galeria Dulux, na própria instituição.

Clique para exibir o slide.

Entre as criações, estão A Toca, casa da família Weasley, a loja Olivaras Varinhas e a Grande Escadaria de Hogwarts. O projeto recebeu o nome de Smoke and Mirrors (Fumaça e Espelhos em tradução livre) e foi desenvolvido pelos estudantes durante um curso de verão de 12 dias. summary: Despite all my rage
title: Despite all my rage
body:
- tomoewantsdolls

Written for Drarryland 2019

Rating: T

Wordcount: 676

Prompt:  “ Merlin! You’ve drawn the Five of Wands, upright. You must write a story with themes of rivalry, conflict, and competition. The element that you should channel is fire–passion, explosive, fight. The tea leaves tell us you will write between 311 words and 677 words. ”

Summary:  Potter never listens

Warnings: mentions of death

Read on AO3

 “Potter!” Draco yelled trying to be heard above the roaring fire. When the stupid moron that was his partner finally deigned to stop climbing and turned to look at him, Draco channelled all his rage and his fury into his gestures. “What the hell are you thinking! It’s easier this way!”

 “I think I saw an opening!” Potter was hollering from six feet above him and to his left, but Draco could barely understand him.

 “You think you saw your death! Stop right there! We came from that path!” Draco threw his arms to the right and looked critically at the path, which looked less transitable than before, but better than climbing a thirty-plus-foot wall of crumbling rocks without the help of their magic. Draco mourned again the loss of their wands before turning to yell at Potter once more, but Potter was gesturing at something up the mountain.

 “I can reach that ledge, and then I…!” The mountain trembled; the wards were falling apart and Draco felt the urge to flee to a safer place. “I can enter the cave by that opening!”

 Draco strained his eyes. The ledge was another 12 feet up and the opening seemed insufficient for an adult to pass through.

 “Are you insane! Of course you are, what I am thinking,” Draco’s throat was sore from all the shouting, “Fine! Go to your death! I bet that before you fall to the flaming hell of annihilation down there I’ll reach the mouth of the cave, clear the entrance, find the exit to civilisation and be at home writing your obituary for the Prophet! Harry James Potter, passed at 26 due to his own stupidity, leaving an irate grieving partner who TOLD HIM SO!”

 “What!”

 “Aaarrgh!” Draco turned as fast as he could on the narrow path and started to hike his way up to the mouth of the cave. Big chunks of rock had fallen, hindering the narrow pathway. “Stupid Potter, stupid idiot who can’t do anything without making a mess of it. Who asked to be your partner? You asked! Not me!” He shouted over his shoulder. “And what for? You never LISTEN! Best record solving cases and you’ll die young before you can be promoted. And you know what? I’d quit! I’d quit before you can be my boss! YOU HEAR ME! Or better still, you survive and I’ll be the one promoted, and then I’ll be your boss and I…!”

 An explosion cut him mid-rant. He turned to see rocks and dust falling, half the ridge gone, and no sign of Potter.

 “No, Potter!” Draco strided back down as fast as he could, stumbling as he searched up and down looking for any sign of the bespectacled idiot. “Potter! You utter prick, answer me!” Draco fought the fear running through his veins. “Damn you. Potter!” Nothing. “Harry!”

 He reached the end of the accessible path, the rest of it having disappeared under the debris. No sign of Potter. He felt his knees subside, disbelief numbing his senses. The fire was near but he couldn’t feel the heat, he couldn’t feel the rumble of the mountain under him nor the diminished wards of the ancient place crumbling. He barely registered the loud crack behind him but felt vividly the pressure and the nausea of an impromptu Disapparation.

 They landed in a heap of limbs and dusty robes with Draco on top of the Supreme Idiot. Actually, Draco thought he was hallucinating at first, but when he assessed that he was grabbing the lapels of his live partner’s robes and not a ghost’s, he punched the git on the jaw for good measure.

 “Ouch! That was uncalled for!”

 “You idiot! You utter prick! You imbecile bonehead dunce, how dare you! I thought you had died on me!” Draco was sobbing, but he couldn’t waste time being mortified when he needed to scream. To make thing worse Potter hugged him tightly, muttering sorrys over and over. He stopped pretending he wasn’t crying.

 “I won’t do that again.”

 “You better not.”

reblog.comment:
- tomoewantsdolls

summary:
Gryffindor: *laying awake in bed* Hey are you asleep yet?
Ravenclaw: Yes.
Gryffindor: Oh okay, I won’t bother you then.
~two...
body:
Gryffindor: *laying awake in bed* Hey are you asleep yet?

Ravenclaw: Yes.

Gryffindor: Oh okay, I won’t bother you then.

~two hours later~

Gryffindor: …

Gryffindor: Wait a fucking second.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, James Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

tags: Harry Potter and the goblet of fire
Harry Potter et la coupe de feu
summary: Harry Potter, tome 4 : La Coupe de Feu - J.K. Rowling
title: Harry Potter, tome 4 : La Coupe de Feu - J.K. Rowling
body:
Harry Potter, tome 4 : La Coupe de Feu – J.K. Rowling

Résumé: Après un horrible été chez les Dursley, Harry Potter entre en quatrième année au collège de Poudlard. À quatorze ans, il voudrait simplement être un jeune sorcier comme les autres, retrouver ses amis Ron et Hermione, assister avec eux à la Coupe du Monde de Quidditch, apprendre de nouveaux sortilèges et essayer des potions inconnues. Une grande nouvelle l’attend à son arrivée : la tenue…

View On WordPress

Harry Potter, tome 4 : La Coupe de Feu – J.K. Rowling

Résumé: Après un horrible été chez les Dursley, Harry Potter entre en quatrième année au collège de Poudlard. À quatorze ans, il voudrait simplement être un jeune sorcier comme les autres, retrouver ses amis Ron et Hermione, assister avec eux à la Coupe du Monde de Quidditch, apprendre de nouveaux sortilèges et essayer des potions inconnues. Une grande nouvelle l’attend à son arrivée : la tenue…

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, James Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
